english.segment3: I want it, I need it, I taste it, I breathe it, It fuels my aggression, And fuels all my questions. I cannot conceal it, it hits me, I feel it, It kills me, I bleed it, now I believe it
english.segment4: I, I want it, I, I need it, I, I breathe it, You are the New Drug, I, I want You, I, I need You, I, believe You, You are the New Drug
english.segment5: Vs 2. I want it, I need it, I trust it, I breathe it, It fuels my aggression, And fuels all my questions. I cannot conceal it, it drives me, I feel it, It fills me, I need it, now I believe it
english.segment6: I want to let it go
english.segment7: I, I want it, I, I need it, I, I breathe it, You are the New Drug, I, I want You, I, I need You, I, believe You, You are the New Drug
english.segment8: Breakdown. Don't hold your breathe (X4). Breathe
english.segment9: I, I want it, I, I need it, I, I breathe it, You are the New Drug, I, I want You, I, I need You, I, believe You, You are the New Drug
english.segment10: I want it, I need it, I breathe it. You are the New Drug. I want it, I need it, I bleed it, You are the New Drug
